name: Cerulean Paisley Floral Scarf
description:
This Cerulean Paisley Floral Scarf is double sided. Silver thread runs through the fabric of the scarf, giving it a slight shimmer. Scarf can be worn on either side, as the edges have been finished off with baby hem. Made from chiffon fabric, it is very lightweight and perfect for the cool and warm weathers.

The fabric makes this scarf particularly easy to wear. You don't have to worry about noticeable harsh wrinkles, and it drapes beautifully!

The scarf measures: 78" x 18"

Packaged in professional sturdy Kraft box for gifting and/or storing!

  ****************************
All my scarves are made using fabric directly from the industry and cannot be found in stores. They are also limited in quantity as I try to keep a variety of stock and the turnover rate high as to ensure new items are continuously listed for my customers... so order before they are gone :)

Please check out my other scarves and accessories at: www.stillglory.com

Feel free to send me a contact if you have any questions~!

name: Peony Fascinator with Feathers and Rhinestone center
description:
This Peony Off White Fascinator measures about 2 3/4" x 3 3/4" at its widest points (including feathers and hair comb). The peony itself measures about 2 1/4" diameter. It is composed of 5 off white Shantug petals, 3 stripped Rooster feathers in white, a hint of tulle, and 3 rhinestone pieces. This fascinator is attatched to a hair comb, for ease of use. 

This fascinator is ready to be shipped.

An original design, each petal has been carefully cut, stitched, and arranged to form a one of a kind design.


****

If you are interested in a custom piece ( size, colors, etc.) or large bridal party order, please contact me for details. I would be more than happy to work on your order!

name: Daisy Off White Fascinator with Rhinestone center
description:
This Of White Daisy fascinator measures about 3.5" x 3.5" at its widest points. It is composed of 5 off white Shantug petals and 3 rhinestone pieces. This fascinator is attached to a hair comb.


This fascinator is made to order.

An original design, each petal has been carefully cut, pressed, stitched, and arranged to form a one of a kind design. Please expect slight variations, due to handmade nature of fascinator. The final product will be a close match.


Thanks for looking~!

****

If you are interested in a custom piece ( size, colors, etc.) or large bridal party order, please contact me for details. I would be more than happy to work on your order!

name: Off White Flower Fascinator with Pearls and Swarovski Crystals
description:
This Off White fascinator measures about 3.5" x 3.5" at its widest points. It is composed of Shantug petals, tulle, Marabou feathers, Sterling Silver + Swarovski Crystal Stamens, and pearls. This fascinator is attached to a hair comb, for ease of use. If you would like an alligator clip, brooch pin, silver bobby pin, or barrette instead, please include in, "note to seller," when checking out.


An original design, each petal has been carefully cut, pressed, stitched, and arranged to form a one of a kind design. Please expect slight variations, due to handmade nature of fascinator. The final product will be a close match.

Please visit my shop: http://www.etsy.com/shop/stillglory

Thanks for looking~!

****

If you are interested in a custom piece ( size, colors, etc.) or large bridal party order, please contact me for details. I would be more than happy to work on your order!
